# Module: tf.contrib.copy_graph

### Module `tf.contrib.copy_graph`



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/copy_graph/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/copy_graph/__init__.py).

Functions to copy elements between graphs.

See the [Copying Graph Elements (contrib)](../../../../api_guides/python/contrib.copy_graph) guide.

## Functions

[`copy_variable_to_graph(...)`](../../tf/contrib/copy_graph/copy_variable_to_graph): Given a `Variable` instance from one `Graph`, initializes and returns
